name: Montauk
description:
Overview

In 2004 screenwriter Charlie Kaufman wrote the film "Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind which follows the main character undergoing a medical procedure to delete specific traumatic memories. This is done through the vehicle of sequentially reliving them in a dream. This exploration of the reliving, examination and possible deletion of memories through a dream state was the primary inspiration of this project. 

Instead of focusing on the deletion of memories however I was interested more in the distortion that occurs when "misremembering" them. Over time, memories tend to become warped and their true nature is forgotten.

Instructions

Controls

  • - Use WASD and the mouse to move through the dream and memories.
  • - Left click or move into orange objects to interact

Gameplay

  • - Explore the memories through the doors in the dream
  • - Interact with orange items to reveal the true nature of the sounds
  • - Return to the dream after completing each section. There are three steps for    each of the three areas.
  • - Click and hold on the cubes on the beach to interact with them. Walk into the    spheres on the cliffs to interact with them. Stand in the halos in the bunker to    interact with them.
